title: Melbourne Stars v Sydney Sixers
articleDescription: BBL cricket at the MCG on Thursday 8 January 2026
articleContent:
The Big Bash League is back for another season – bringing all the colour and excitement to the ‘G. Extra services will help you get to and from the MCG on Thursday 8 January.

The match will begin at 7:15 pm and concludes at approximately 10:25 pm.

Before you travel

If you use Journey Planner within 14 days of this event, you'll see all the extra services we've added to help you get there.

Metropolitan train

Metro Trains Additional Services

Additional services for the following lines depart from Richmond and Flinders Street stations after the game:

  • Mernda, Greensborough, Flinders Street, Ringwood, Glen Waverley, and Craigieburn.

Pakenham, Cranbourne, Frankston and Sandringham Passengers are to alight on any available service from Jolimont (Platform 1) or Richmond (Platforms 7 & 8) then transfer at Flinders Street for a train to Parliament to enable a bus connection.

Werribee, Williamstown and Sunbury passengers are to alight on any available service from Jolimont (Platform 1) then transfer at Flinders Street for a train to North Melbourne to enable a bus connection.

Craigieburn specials will depart from Flinders Street 30–35 minutes after the match.

Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from the MCG

Route 48

  • Trams will operate as a shuttle between Wellington Parade/Simpson Street Stop 13 and Collins Street/Victoria Harbour Stop D18

Route 70a

  • Trams will operate as a shuttle between Flinders Street West Stop 06, and MCG/John Cain Arena stop 7C. 

Route 75a

  • Trams will operate as a shuttle between Flinders Street Stop 04 and Wellington Parade/Simpson Street Stop 13.

Metropolitan bus

Customers can catch the following buses close to the MCG:

  • Route 246

Please note, services may terminate prior to the end of the match.

Regional train

Additional services for the following lines depart from Southern Cross after the match:

Waurn Ponds, Melton

Return coaches for the following lines depart after the match:

Seymour Line
